TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_tay_pn’asan_ryax, title = pn’asan_ryax, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Atayal]}, url = {https://tay.wikipedia.org/wiki/pn’asan_ryax} }

S.FORM: == pn'asan ryax == utux utux kawas ga, maki pcpung mtenah alang ta, ksli'an ta kwara ryax haca. lpyung ta ro kwara gluw ta, ana kahul theya' sali' naha ga, p'asun naha mwah tisal sali' ta, lama skbalay nni'un kwara utux utux sali', nyan mnaga uwah naha.

== pn'asan ryax == otox otox kawas ga, maki pcpong mtenah alang ta, ksli'an ta kwara ryax haca. lpyong ta ro kwara glow ta, ana kahol theya' sali' naha ga, p'ason naha mwah tisal sali' ta, lama skbalay nni'on kwara otox otox sali', nyan mnaga owah naha.
